ValidationRule.description: To deploy a story to UAT it requires a documentation, an approved test script and the peer review should be passed. Please refer to internal process documentation for more info.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( BEGINS(copado__Environment__r.Name, "Dev"), OR( copado__Promote_and_Deploy__c = TRUE, copado__Promote_Change__c = TRUE ), OR( ISBLANK( DocumentationLocation__c ), TestScriptReady__c = FALSE, PeerReviewPassed__c = FALSE ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To deploy a story to UAT it requires a documentation, an approved test script and the peer review should be passed. Please refer to internal process documentation for more info.
